question: i have been told various things about this,  i had a stroke on feb 8th   was taken to hospital , somerville ,n,j. treated for this and additional type 2 diabetes, high b.p. and high clos.  doing some rehab, but had to come to daughter in n.c.  do fine except the numbness, no control of left arm, leg, numbness goes into lips, nose, even hair.   question,   what is this and how do i get it gone.  need the input,  havent  ever ever been sick, 58 yrs old. really need a little guidance on this.  hoping someone out there can give me a little info and reassurancethanks so much
title: numbness of left side of body, head to toe
